amendment.description: To make available from Other Procurement, Army, up to $1,500,000 for a Convoy Training Simulator for the Montana Army National Guard.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4894 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4894 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S9092; text: CR S9092) To make available from Other Procurement, Army, up to $1,500,000 for a Convoy Training Simulator for the Montana Army National Guard.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4894 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4894 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
